moment.name: date-fns
moment.reason: Modular, tree-shakeable, smaller bundle; moment is in maintenance mode

moment-timezone.name: date-fns-tz
moment-timezone.reason: Works with date-fns, tree-shakeable, smaller footprint

request.name: got
request.reason: request is deprecated; got is actively maintained with modern API

request-promise.name: got
request-promise.reason: request-promise is deprecated; got supports promises natively

request-promise-native.name: got
request-promise-native.reason: Deprecated with request; got is the modern replacement

lodash.name: es-toolkit
lodash.reason: Modern, tree-shakeable, TypeScript-first; many lodash utils are now native JS

underscore.name: es-toolkit
underscore.reason: Largely superseded by native JS and modern utility libraries

express.name: fastify
express.reason: 5x faster, built-in schema validation, better plugin system

chalk.name: picocolors
chalk.reason: 2x faster, 14x smaller, no dependencies; chalk moved to ESM-only

colors.name: picocolors
colors.reason: colors had a supply-chain incident; picocolors is safer and smaller

axios.name: ky
axios.reason: Built on native fetch, smaller bundle, modern API

node-fetch.name: built-in fetch
node-fetch.reason: Node 18+ includes native fetch(); no extra dependency needed

cross-fetch.name: built-in fetch
cross-fetch.reason: Node 18+ includes native fetch(); no polyfill needed

isomorphic-fetch.name: built-in fetch
isomorphic-fetch.reason: Node 18+ includes native fetch(); no polyfill needed

uuid.name: crypto.randomUUID
uuid.reason: Node 19+ and all modern browsers have crypto.randomUUID() built-in

inquirer.name: @inquirer/prompts
inquirer.reason: Official successor, modular, smaller install size

commander.name: citty
commander.reason: Lighter weight, modern API â€” though commander is still well-maintained

yargs.name: citty
yargs.reason: Lighter, modern API; yargs has a large dependency tree

minimist.name: mri
minimist.reason: Faster, maintained successor with same API

rimraf.name: fs.rm
rimraf.reason: Node 14+ has fs.rm with { recursive: true, force: true } built-in

mkdirp.name: fs.mkdir
mkdirp.reason: Node 10+ has fs.mkdirSync/fs.mkdir with { recursive: true } built-in

del.name: fs.rm
del.reason: Node 14+ has fs.rm with { recursive: true, force: true } built-in

body-parser.name: express.json()
body-parser.reason: Built into Express 4.16+; no separate install needed

nodemon.name: node --watch
nodemon.reason: Node 18.11+ has built-in --watch mode for development

ts-node.name: tsx
ts-node.reason: Faster, uses esbuild under the hood, better ESM support

tslint.name: eslint
tslint.reason: TSLint is deprecated; ESLint with typescript-eslint is the standard

babel-eslint.name: @babel/eslint-parser
babel-eslint.reason: babel-eslint is deprecated; use the official @babel scoped package

left-pad.name: String.padStart
left-pad.reason: Built into JavaScript since ES2017; no dependency needed

is-promise.name: instanceof Promise
is-promise.reason: Native check works in all modern environments

is-plain-object.name: structuredClone or manual check
is-plain-object.reason: Simple utility easily inlined; no package needed

object-assign.name: Object.assign or spread
object-assign.reason: Built into JavaScript since ES2015; no polyfill needed

array-flatten.name: Array.flat
array-flatten.reason: Built into JavaScript since ES2019; no package needed

bluebird.name: native Promise
bluebird.reason: Native Promises now have good performance; async/await is standard

q.name: native Promise
q.reason: Q is unmaintained; native Promises replaced it entirely

async.name: native Promise methods
async.reason: Promise.all, Promise.allSettled, for-await-of cover most async patterns now

superagent.name: got
superagent.reason: got is more actively maintained with a modern API

needle.name: built-in fetch
needle.reason: Node 18+ includes native fetch(); simpler than needle

winston.name: pino
winston.reason: 5x faster, lower overhead, better for production

bunyan.name: pino
bunyan.reason: Pino is the spiritual successor; faster and actively maintained

log4js.name: pino
log4js.reason: Pino is faster and more modern; log4js has a large footprint

mocha.name: vitest
mocha.reason: Faster, built-in coverage, ESM-native, great DX

jasmine.name: vitest
jasmine.reason: Modern test runner with better performance and ecosystem integration

karma.name: vitest
karma.reason: Karma is deprecated; Vitest handles browser testing via Playwright

jest.name: vitest
jest.reason: API-compatible drop-in, faster via Vite, better ESM support

enzyme.name: @testing-library/react
enzyme.reason: Enzyme is unmaintained; Testing Library is the React team's recommendation

bower.name: npm
bower.reason: Bower is deprecated; npm/yarn/pnpm replaced it entirely

gulp.name: npm scripts or Vite
gulp.reason: Task runners largely replaced by npm scripts and modern bundlers

grunt.name: npm scripts or Vite
grunt.reason: Grunt is legacy; npm scripts or modern build tools are simpler

webpack.name: Vite
webpack.reason: 10-100x faster dev builds, simpler config, growing ecosystem

parcel.name: Vite
parcel.reason: Vite has broader ecosystem support and faster HMR

rollup.name: tsup
rollup.reason: tsup wraps esbuild+rollup with zero-config for library bundling

tsd.name: vitest typecheck
tsd.reason: Vitest includes built-in type testing; no separate tool needed
